FinancialAccount.name: FinancialAccount
FinancialAccount.description: Represents a financing option, such as an automotive loan or lease related to a customer.

AmountDue.description: The amount that is due for payment for the financial account.

AmountPastDue.description: The payment amount that wasn't paid by the due date.

BranchUnitId.description: The captive finance unit associated with the financial account.

ClosingDate.description: The date when the financial account was closed.

CreditLimit.description: The total credit limit avaialble for the financial account.

DaysPastDue.description: The number of days past the payment due date.

DownPaymentAmount.description: An initial up-front partial payment amount.

FinancialAccountNumber.description: The identifier of the financial account.

InsurancePaidYearToDate.description: The total amount of insurance premium paid in the current tax year.

InterestPaidYearToDate.description: The total amount of interest paid in the current tax year.

InterestRate.description: The rate of interest applied on the loan or lease.

InterestType.description: Specifies the type of interest applied to the loan or lease.

IsHeldAway.description: Indicates whether this financial account is owned externally (true) or in-house (false).

IsOverdraftAllowed.description: Indicates whether the financial account allows an overdraft (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MaturityDate.description: The date when the financial account with a fixed term matures.

Name.description: The name of the financial account.

OpeningDate.description: The date when the financial account was opened.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the financial account record.

PaymentDueDate.description: The date when the payment is due for the financial account.

PrincipalAmount.description: The principal amount on the financial account.

PrincipalPaidYearToDate.description: The total amount paid against the principal in the current tax year.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the financial account.

RelatedFinancialAccountId.description: The parent of the financial account.

RemainingDuration.description: The duration in months from the current date to the maturity date or the prepayment date.

RenewalDate.description: The date when the financial account is due for renewal.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the financial account in an external system such as a captive finance dealer management system.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the financial account.

Term.description: The term for which a loan or lease is taken.

TotalOutstandingAmount.description: The total outstanding amount on the financial account.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the financial account.
